text: Hanki Jehoasi'ma kinima mani'nea knafina, kasnampa ne' Elisa'a rankri erino fri'za hu'ne. Higeno kini ne' Jehoasi'a uramino vuno Elisana avuga zavi ome neteno amanage hu'ne, nafanimoke, nafanimoke, kagra ha'mahu karisigna nehunka, hosi afu agumpima mani'neza ha'ma nehaza vahekna hu'nenka, Israeli vahera hanavetinka zamaza nehana nere.
